name: Example program
description: Program template. Format can be f (float), i (integer) b (boolean) or s (string). Address can be string or array.

parameters.name: Slider parameter
parameters.description: An optional description of the parameter

parameters.name: Select menu parameter
parameters.description: If format is int, you can use a valueMap for labels. Min value is used as offset for indexes in the valueMap.

parameters.name: Select item menu
parameters.description: A menu that enables the selected item, and disables the others, sending valueOn to the address that corresponds to the selected menu item, and valueOff to the other items. If valueMap has more values than address, off value will be sent to all.

parameters.name: On/Off parameter
parameters.description: If format is boolean, the parameter is displayed as on/off. The min value is used for false, max for true.

parameters.name: Push parameter
parameters.description: Use push=<label> on a boolean parameter to show as a push button with provided label. setBefore/After accepts a delay in ms.
